name: llm-response-parser
description: Parse and validate structured output from LLM responses

ai.summary: Extract and validate JSON and lists from raw LLM text output, handling markdown code blocks, trailing commas, and single quotes.
capabilities: Extract JSON from markdown code blocks or raw text
Fix common LLM JSON mistakes (trailing commas, single quotes)
Extract numbered or bulleted lists from text
Validate parsed dicts against required/optional key schemas
ai.usage:
from aigogo.llm_response_parser import extract_json, extract_list, validate_keys
data = extract_json(llm_response_text)
items = extract_list(llm_response_text)
validated = validate_keys(data, required=['name', 'age'])
ai.inputs: Raw LLM response text (string), optional key lists for validation
ai.outputs: Parsed Python dicts/lists, or raises ValueError on failure
